blogPost.title: The housing boom continues with US Home Prices hitting all-time highs again, up 10.4% over the past year. https://t.co/R8NZqHMcmX
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 房产热潮仍在继续，美国房价再创历史新高，过去一年上涨10.4%。https://t.co/R8NZqHMcmX。
房產熱潮仍在繼續，美國房價再創歷史新高，過去一年上漲10.4%。https://t.co/R8NZqHMcmX。
